scripts.pre: npx -y only-allow pnpm && node -e "if(require('fs').existsSync('./scripts/generate-from-template.ts')) require('child_process').execSync('npx --package=ts-node ts-node ./scripts/generate-from-template.ts')"
scripts.build:dev: pnpm pre && NODE_ENV=development pnpm run build
scripts.clean: pnpm pre && turbo run clean && rimraf --glob **/.next && rimraf --glob **/.turbo && rimraf .turbo && rimraf --glob **/node_modules
scripts.stop-deps: POSTGRES_DELAY_MS=0 pnpm run deps-compose kill && POSTGRES_DELAY_MS=0 pnpm run deps-compose down -v
scripts.init-db: pnpm pre && pnpm run prisma db push && pnpm run prisma db seed
scripts.wait-until-postgres-is-ready:pg_isready: until pg_isready -h localhost -p 5432; do sleep 1; done
scripts.wait-until-postgres-is-ready: command -v pg_isready >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm run wait-until-postgres-is-ready:pg_isready || sleep 10  # not everyone has pg_isready installed, so we fallback to sleeping
scripts.start-deps:no-delay: pnpm pre && pnpm run deps-compose up --detach --build && pnpm run wait-until-postgres-is-ready && pnpm run init-db && echo "\nDependencies started in the background as Docker containers. 'pnpm run stop-deps' to stop them"n
scripts.restart-deps: pnpm pre && pnpm run stop-deps && pnpm run start-deps
scripts.restart-deps:no-delay: pnpm pre && pnpm run stop-deps && pnpm run start-deps:no-delay
scripts.verify-data-integrity: pnpm pre && pnpm -C apps/backend run verify-data-integrity
